Description:
Homefront - subject-oriented cinematic thriller, in which the script is important. In work on the storyline involved a famous Hollywood screenwriter John Milius ("Apocalypse Now", "Red Dawn") and former US intelligence officer. The authors have come up with realistic geopolitical scenario in which, by 2025 the US economy will be finally destroyed by the second wave of the crisis, and score political and military power of New Korea (formed through the merger of North and South Korea) will explode over the weakened US nuclear warhead and occupies the west of the country. The American people, who lost the regular army, but not broken, will continue to fight the invaders, leading them against the hard-edged partisan warfare. Their main task - to raise an insurrection in San Francisco, which became the base of the occupation forces.
